title: Indian Army ATAGS Howitzer Fielding
dc:creator: Stephen W. Miller
description:
The Advanced Towed Artillery System (ATAGS), referred to by the Ministry of Defence as the “Future mainstay of the Army’s artillery, is on the final path toward operational fielding. ATAGS was initiated in the mid-2010s as one of several initiatives designed to increase the firepower of Indian artillery. The project was a collaboration between India’s […]
